title: Drawing, "Study for a portal for Villa Albani, Rome", 1750–55
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Architectural study of arch topped with pediment.  Two eagles sit at each end of the pediment, the capitols of Corinthian columns are visible.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Study for a portal for Villa Albani, Rome", 1750–55. 13.6 x 18.6 cm (5 3/8 x 7 5/16 in.). Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-485.
